div.p: DK Cuppa Tea is solely owned by DK Aromatherapy, a Hong Kong’s Aromatherapy Brand. DK Cuppa Tea is an urban oasis for patrons to relax, rejuvenate and revitalize over a great selection of organic teas and...

DK Cuppa Tea is solely owned by DK Aromatherapy, a Hong Kong’s Aromatherapy Brand. DK Cuppa Tea is an urban oasis for patrons to relax, rejuvenate and revitalize over a great selection of organic teas and coffees, quick bites and sweet treats. We offer workshops and private parties, as well as corporate events.

div.h3: We Offer: Private Party, Private Dinner, Tailor Made Food Menu, Aromatherapy Workshop, Private/Corporate Class, Private Workshop W/ Healthy Food
